item.title: Câu hỏi luyện thi chứng chỉ AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate (SAA-C03) - Phần 1
item.description: Question 1 A large engineering company plans to deploy a distributed application with Amazon Aurora as a database. The database should be restored with a Recovery Time objective (RTO) of one minute when there is a service degradation in the primary region. The service restoration should incur the least admin work. What approach can be initiated to design an Aurora database to meet cross-region disaster recovery requirements? A. Use Amazon Aurora Global Database and use the secondary region as a failover for service degradation in the primary region
